adviseScripts.text: Your hairstyle is rather unique.
Huh? Why are you talking about my hair all of a sudden?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: ... How exactly is it unique?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: It looks like a firework going off mid-explosion.
It looks like a majestic lion's mane.
Haha, fireworks, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You've got a good eye. Better than I initially thought, at least.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: However, you can suck up to me all you want, but I'm never holding your hand.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Have you ever seen a lion before?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If you have nothing better to do than pester me, I suggest you go to sleep, Human.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: My conversation with Nihilister didn't last very long.
How strong would you say you are?
Do you really have to ask?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You should know better than most. You've fought against me before.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Let me throw that question back at you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: How strong do I look to you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Um... your strength is beyond compare.
You've got a clear weakness, so I don't feel you're all that strong.
I should have expected as much from a weakling like yourself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Or is this just tiresome flattery?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Now, it goes without saying that I blow you and your compadres out of the water,
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: but so long as my cohorts and the Queen exist, I don't want any brown-nosing from you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You have no idea how much that hurts coming from a human.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What's worse... it's true.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I'm working on it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: One day, I will personally take care of everyone who ever had any doubts about my strength.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I share a short conversation with Nihilister.
*Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You seem stressed.
You seem chipper.
That obvious, huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I've got an appetite for destruction, and I'm starving.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I feel like my patience is quickly coming to an end.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: A word of advice: If you don't want to get on my nerves, get lost.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: ... Chipper?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Does me being helpless strike you as something that'd make me happy?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Don't test my patience any further. Run along and get back to work.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Before I incinerate this place and everyone in it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: It seems that leaving Nihilister alone is the best option for today.
Nihilister, let's eat together.
Sorry.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I don't really eat food.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Besides, what reason would I have to eat with you of all people?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Fair point.
Come on, indulge me.
Good. You catch on quick.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: How irritating it must be to have a human body.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Having to eat and sleep even in a situation like this.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Do you not understand English?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Let me put this in a way that your little pea brain will comprehend:
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: No.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: After being rejected by Nihilister, I finish my food on my own.
Have you always had a such flagrant disregard for your own well-being?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What? No, of course not.
Kinda.
Oh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What about the way you act towards me?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If that's not considered careless, I don't know what is.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I'm disappointed you didn't pick up on that sooner.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I don't know if you're the luckiest person on earth, or something else...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Anyway, I can clearly see how far you're willing to go.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: A mere human willing to cast themselves into the fiery pits of hell itself... Very intriguing.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Our short conversation ends.
What are you starting at?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I was admiring your weapons.
I was admiring your face.
Oh, these?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: These little guys really come in handy at times.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: They can turn pretty much anything into a shish kebab instantaneously.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: *Sigh*
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You're lucky. Any other human wouldn't get to live long enough to see my face.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: At any rate, you're weirding me out.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Nihilister.
Nihilister, I have something I'm curious about.
Your curiosity knows no bounds, Human.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I'm not in the mood to deal with your incessant questions.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Fine, you get to ask one question. And make it quick.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Do you still have any of your memories as a Nikke?
On second thought, I'll come back when you're feeling better.
No.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Satisfied? Now get out. You're getting on my last nerve.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Actually...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I'm feeling a little better now.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What are you so curious about, anyway?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I have a conversation with Nihilister while trying to cheer her up.
Do you have any hobbies?
Hobbies?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Not really.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What kind of thing did you think I'd do in my spare time?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: ... Reading?
... Exercise?
Look, Human.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I don't know how you got it in your head that I'm some kind of a bookworm,
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: but reading isn't really my bag, all right?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Well, I do feel a sort of release of tension whenever I break things.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I suppose you could call that a kind of exercise.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: All right then, my hobby is destroying things, haha!
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Nihilister and I continue to talk about hobbies.
*Sigh* I'm going stir-crazy in this place.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Something needs to change or I'm going to start busting heads.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Got any ideas how I can release some tension?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Let's do some breathing exercises.
We could play a game.
Oh, that's a good idea!
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Some fire breathing is sure to do me some good.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: *whoooosh*
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Wait! Not fire!
What kind of game?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Whoever kills the most people wins?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: It doesn't matter what game you pick, I'll stomp you either way.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I spend time distracting Nihilister from her ennui.
What do you think it'd be like if Vapaus was easy to obtain?
Either I wouldn't be here, or you wouldn't be here.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Either of the two.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Maybe both of us would be here.
Or maybe neither of us would be here.
If the two of us saved each other, then perhaps that'd be a possibility.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: The only thing is that we wouldn't have done that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: At least I wouldn't have.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: No, impossible.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If no human could kill me, then it would stand to reason that I would be the ultimate weapon.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: That would mean I'd have to do whatever it took to defend my title.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Anyone who defied me would be obliterated and turned into ashes.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: That would include you, Human.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Nihilister and I pontificate about other hypothetical scenarios.
Human, how do you like it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: ... Sexy?
... Well-done?
Huh?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What are you talking about?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I'm talking about how you like your steaks.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Meanwhile, you're with your head in the gutter talking about what can I only presume is women.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Finally, something we can agree on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Nothing beats a nice crispy char on some well-done meat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If you're exposing your food to open flame anyway, why not go all the way and go for well-done?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I share a short conversation with Nihilister.
Nihilister, I need fire.
Fire? Is it a battle?!
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What do I need to burn?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I need some help making a bonfire.
I just need a small fire to cook some food.
Fine. Just this once.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If you ever call me again for something this menial again,
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: you'll be what's burning.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Wait a minute...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Are you telling me you actually found some decent food on the surface? That's no mean feat.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I suppose I can make an exception and do you a favor.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I'll cook you up nice and crispy.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: No, wait...!
With Nihilister's help, I manage to procure some fire.
You said whichever Nikkes stick by your side end up performing better, didn't you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What's the secret? Does it really amount to just sticking close to you?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: My devilish good looks.
My skills as a commander.
Hmm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You're somewhat easy on the eyes, I'll give you that.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: But not enough to entice all these Nikkes into following you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Pompous humans trying to be commanders for the clout are a dime a dozen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Fame isn't what you're after, I know that much.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If you don't want to tell me, just say so.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I have a short conversation with Nihilister.
What would you most want in a partner, Nihilister?
That's a bit random...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: What I'd want most...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I don't think I've ever thought about it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: How about someone who protects you?
Or someone who needs protecting?
Nah.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I prefer to do my own fighting.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If someone got in my way trying to protect me, I'd probably end up toasting them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Hmm... you're probably right. I suppose it'd be better for me to protect them.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: That way I could be in battles all day.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Sounds kinda fun, don't you think?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I have a short conversation with Nihilister.
Why are humans trying to reclaim the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: From what I hear, the Ark is perfectly livable.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: We're reclaiming what was originally ours.
It gives us the strength to go on.
What, so you own it?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Don't be ridiculous.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: There's no such thing as ownership in this world.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Those with power, steal, and those without power get stolen from.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Hm...
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I think I'm beginning to understand why you pathetic humans are still clinging on.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Muddling through is still a way of surviving.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Nihilister and I have a deep conversation.
Can you tell me more about Liberalio?
Ha! Now you're asking about my cohorts? You really have become brazen.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Why should I tell you anything?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: She's someone you'll have to deal with down the line anyway.
Something tells me you two aren't on good terms.
True enough.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: But the same goes for you too, Human.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: We may have made a deal, but we didn't shake on it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: We could never be on good terms.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: She's a mind-numbingly boring narcoleptic child.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: At any rate, I haven't gone toe to toe with her, so I don't have much else to add.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I have a short conversation with Nihilister.
Nihilister, how is life up on the surface?
I don't know what you want me to tell you.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Are you genuinely curious about what I do up on the surface?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I'm just curious about what it's like to live on the surface all the time.
It's not often I get to talk to someone who spends most of their time up on the surface.
That's not a good enough reason to ask such a stupid question.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I burn. I destroy. I kill.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: That's what life on the surface consists of.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If you're looking for a sappy love story, then go read a book.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You've spent a good chunk of time up there, you should know. You've probably seen your fair share of mangled-up bodies.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I hate to tell you, but you've seen pretty much all there is to see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: As for myself, I have a ball up here torching, destroying, and killing whatever I see.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Nihilister and I have a conversation about the surface.
Do you know about Johan?
Johan?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Who is that?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: The commander who fired the Vapaus at you.
The commander who was at Eden.
Oh, that little pest?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Why bring up such an embarrassing memory?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Now you managed to worsen my bad mood.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: So, I see that pest has a name.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: He is an irksome fly that
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: insists on getting in my way at every turn.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I will take great pleasure in cremating him myself.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Nihilister and I converse while thinking of Johan.
I go towards Nihilister and hand her some water.
What is this?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Want some?
If we're talking about elements, water beats fire.
Don't try and kiss up to me.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Besides, I know how important water is for humans who are up on the surface.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You drink it.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: And?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Am I supposed to get into a fistfight with this bottle of water?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Are you intentionally trying to piss me off?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I have a short conversation with Nihilister.
What do you think it would have been like if we met under different circumstances?
What do you mean?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: How would that change anything?
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Perhaps we'd be on better terms.
Maybe the situation wouldn't be as dire as it is.
I don't know if you're just a happy-go-lucky person, or if you're delusional.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: The only way that we would ever be on friendly terms
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: is if we were reborn as siblings.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: If you came here to waste my time on insipid fantasies, then I suggest you leave.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: Believe me, things between you and me are as good as they could ever get.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: You know why? Because you're still alive.
adviseScripts.speaker: Nihilister

adviseScripts.text: I have a short conversation with Nihilister.
